name: Ninad Rathod
summary: Working Professional at MathWorks. I have over four years of industrial experience creating end-to-end automation solutions, with prominent professional ethics and a proven track record of delivering on commitments. I have a keen interest in exploring ways to accelerate workflows through parallel processes and threads. I would also like to learn and work on using AI automation agents and APIs. This website blends my robust engineering foundation with my passion for digital arts and illustration, showcased in a dedicated gallery.
